Translations.Text: An la jue bu kuanshu gei ta shezhi huoban de [da] zui'e [zhu], dan ta kuanshu chu ci zhi wai tasuo yiyu de qita [xiao] guocuo. Shei gei an la shezhi huoban, shei que yi shen xian mi wu.
Tamen she ta [an la] er zhi qiqiu nushen, tamen zhi qiqiu panni de emo.
An la qianze ta [emo], dan ta queshuo:“Wo bi jiang cong ni de puren zhong youhuo yiding de renshu;

wo bi jiang shi tamen mi wu, bi jiang shi tamen wangxiang, bi jiang mingling tamen gelie shengchu de erduo, bi jiang mingling tamen gaibian [zhu] an la de chuangzao wu.” Shei she an la eryi emo wei baohu zhe, shei que yi zaoshou mingxian de sunshi.
Emo yingxu tamen, shi tamen wangxiang, qishi, emo suo yingxu tamen de zhishi qipian er yi.
Zhexie ren de guisu que shi huo yu,[dao shi] tamen jiang faxian wu chu ke tao.
Fan xinyang bing xingshan zhe, wo jiang shi tamen jinru zhu heliuguo de leyuan [zhu], yong ju qizhong. An la de yingxu shi zhenshi de, shei zai yanyu fangmian bi an la geng zhenshi ne?

[An la de yingxu] ji buneng yi nimen [musilin] de yuanwang, ye buneng yi you jing ren de wangxiang. Shei zuo'e, shei zi shou e bao [zhu]. Chu an la wai, ta jiang buneng wei ziji zhaodao renhe baohu zhe he yuanzhu zhe.
Wulun nannu, shei xingshan qie shi xinshi, shei jiang jinru leyuan, bu shou renhe kuidai.

Zai zongjiao [xinyang] fangmian, shei bi chedi guishun an la bing shi xingshan zhe, qie zunxing yi bu la xin de zongjiao——zhengjiao [yisilan jiao] zhe geng youxiu ne? An la ba yi bu la xin dang zhijiao.
Tiandi jian de yiqie dou shi an la de. An la shi zhouzhi wanshi wanwu de.
